sub_title: Undergraduate at NTU School of Material Science and Engineering
summary:
As a student at Nanyang Technology University under the Material Science and Engineering with Second Major Medical Biology program, I wish to leverage this degree to garner valuable new skill sets and gain exposure to the industry.

Graduating from Ngee Ann Polytechnic's Biomedical Science program, I was trained and equipped with skills in biomedical research such as Cell culturing, PCR and Gel electrophoresis. During my internship stint at A*Star, I was exposed to the cross-discipline potential of material science and biomedical science in the project on nanotechnology in drug delivery. 

During my summer internship at NTU MSE lab, I had the opportunity to conduct material research on reversible polymers. This experience has equipped me with training on thermal analysis of materials using Differential scanning calorimetry and dynamic mechanical analysis. It also provided me with the chance to showcase my skills in data analytics using Microsoft Excel and SPSS study and correlate the experimental data and the variables.

Through these internships experiences, I had gained new insight into material research and I'm currently looking to further explore other roles that I can contribute to Singapore's material industry.

awards.title: NTU-Google Career Scholarship
awards.description: This Scholarship is a digital skilling program aimed at helping students develop data and technical skills relevant to the new world of work. There are 9 Specialisations (training tracks), each consisting of 5-8 courses, offered via Coursera, together with practical, hands-on content taught by Googlers who are experts in their field.

profile_positions.title: Research Student

profile_positions.description:
- Joined the work-study scheme offered by NTU. Organized data related to NTU into categories for ease of analysis by the administrative office. 
- Developed a Python script to perform web scraping and categorise the obtained data (https://github.com/LeeSoonYang/Data-Entry-Web-Scrapping)
profile_positions.title: Data Entry Assistant

profile_positions.description:
-Intern under Associate Professor Su​ I-Hsin's lab
-Evaluated the effects of genetic mutation on immune cells' protein synthesis through flow cytometry
-Dissect animal mouse model and culture primary cells for analysis
-Compiled research findings of a certain pharmaceutical on immune cell functions via literature reviews
-Charted research project to evaluate the effects of pharmaceuticals on macrophage and dendritic cells
profile_positions.title: Summer Intern

profile_positions.description:
- Intern at NTU MSE under professor Chen Xiao Dong's lab with tutelage from mentor Dr Ji Shao Bo. The project involved the investigation of two-way reversible effects of the studied polymer and analysis of its thermal properties using Differential scanning calorimetry and dynamic mechanical analysis. Through this internship, we were able to successfully synthesize the polymers while exhibiting their two-way reversible effect. Using knowledge in Microsoft Excel and SPSS to analyse the experimental data, we were able to determine the effective temperature for the two-way reversible effect.
- Partake in 2022 DISCOVER URECA Poster Competition
profile_positions.title: Research Intern

profile_positions.description:
-Part of MSAT A&L and U&D team
-Developed a VBA code that accelerates data collection and data analysis of cleaning results
-Created continuous process validation and trial test documents 
-Partnered with different departments to plan and design props for worksite event
-Improved administrative documents for ease of use
-Assisted with trial results analysis through Python machine learning analysis
-Learn more about the vaccine manufacturing process and involved equipment
-Compiled production results for change control, deviation reports and project documentation
-Support team on documentation and update of SOPs

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Tiktok Tech Immersion

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Student Consultant (NTU PEAK Leadership Programme)

profile_positions.description:
- Tutored students on polytechnic, secondary and primary level subjects, primarily Math and Sciences. During this job, I have tutored 2 Diploma students on Biology and Mathematics, 1 O'level students on Math and Combined Sciences, 2 NA level students on Math and Combined Sciences and 1 PSLE student on Science.
- Planned and organised a study schedule tailored for each of the students based on discussion of the topics which they had difficulties in. Within the 1 year, successfully helped the students who previously gotten a failing grade in Math and Science to achieve a passing grade in their national examinations and a thank you message from the parents
- Utilized skills in Microsoft words to prepare teaching materials, practice questions and summaries for students to strengthen their understanding on the topics and simplify understanding on the topic.
profile_positions.title: Private Tutor

profile_positions.description:
- Served mandatory nation service and underwent specialist training to attained 3rd Sergeant in Singapore Infantry 9th Division, Tekong basic military training institute
- Trained to lead a team through missions in urban and field operations. Utilized the military tactics taught to clear training missions.
- Trained in navigation skills in map reading and usage of prismatic compass and operation of military signals set. Utilized these skill to guide my team through navigation exercise in Singapore and oversea exercise allowing the completion of the oversea navigation exercise within two days instead of the whole three days. 
- Oversaw administrative and disciplinary work in training institute. Lead a team of five fellow national serviceman to manage the disciplinary duties and administrative process. Advice and assisted Warrant officers and officers in disciplinary duties.
- Utilized skills in Microsoft word and excel to prepare monthly disciplinary statistic for presentation in conference. Standardized the reporting formats that is still being used for the regular reporting.
profile_positions.title: NSF

company.name: Asia Pacific Breweries (Singapore) Pte Ltd (Part of the HEINEKEN Company)

profile_positions.company: Asia Pacific Breweries Singapore (Part of The HEINEKEN Company)
profile_positions.description:
- The job involved data Entry into Mendix and Base JDE system. In addition, also assisted with Material Creation into the Mendix System for regular ordering of specific SKU.
- Assisted in updating Order Acknowledgement and Shipping dates, allowing for ease in tracking of the number of incoming stocks and the pallets requirement.
- Overhaul excel sheets used for stock tracking allowing better tracking of stocks and demands forecast.
- Also performed other administrative duties such as filing of order statement
profile_positions.title: Data Entry Assistant

profile_positions.description:
- Set up the dining tables for incoming customers and served food and beverages to customers. Worked during F1, National day and World Cup periods where there was a peak in the number of customers. To effectively operate during these periods, we communicated and divided the labour up among ourselves allowing for a easier workflow. During my stay, the Bistro received 4 stars on Google reviews and the bistro earned an average of 5 thousand Singapore dollars every working day. 
- Other duties include cashiering and cleaning of the drinking glass and plates. Cleaned up the kitchen and Bistro after work and shifting of tables. Successfully cleared the annual cleanliness inspections of the bistro.
profile_positions.title: Service Crew

profile_positions.description:
- Appointed the treasurer of Singapore National Institute of Chemistry (SNIC) Student Chapter Community
- Planned and coordinated on an event to promote the passion of Chemistry among students. Researched and prepared google sheet for materials needed for the events and budgets requirement. Initiated the distribution of emails to recruits helpers for the event from Ngee Ann Polytechnic.
- Was also appointed member of the SNIC Service Award Selection Committee who elect awardees for various SNIC awards
- Representative of Ngee Ann Polytechnic, distribute and sharing of chemistry-related events organized by SNIC or SNIC members. Successfully recruited 3 students from the polytechnic to attend the Chemistry National Meeting Singapore 2018 to learned about Singapore's currents chemistry industry.
profile_positions.title: Student Chapter's Treasurer
